Name: A Planet of Mine
About the game: A Planet of Mine is a mini procedural 4X. Starting from a single and unique planet, survive, gather and combine resources, develop your technologies and start the conquest of space. Choose your strategy wisely to colonize the procedurally generated system and dominate opposing factions by force or exchanges. This PC edition include all updates from the original awarded mobile version. Features Real time simulation of resources (APOM Engine) Procedural generation of stellar systems, planets, biomes and resources 3 game modes (infinite, time attack, builder) Personalized games 10 scenarios to complete 16 animal factions to unlock and play
